law.catch_line: Criterion to break tie vote of selection committee.
law.text: If a selection committee vote results in a tie between two (2) firms, one (1) of which will perform more of the work tasks in Kentucky than the other, then the former firm shall be ranked one (1) place ahead of the latter.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1994.
